A better way to test at work.

Convenient pre-labeled test-kit delivery

We are partnering with the world's leading laboratories to bring the latest in testing advances directly to your workplace. Schedule once, seasonally, or on a monthly basis.

Telehealth supervision

Our testing protocols are trusted in multiple industrial sectors, including hospitality, retail, food processing, manufacturing, and retail. We offer:

Expert billing and legal support

We work with your insurers to minimize cost and risk.

Online Dashboard for integrated reporting and analytics

All of our tests include 12-months access to our online reporting tool. Ongoing support is as low as $3 per employee per month.

Frequently asked questions

What kind of test do we use?

We have partnered with MicroGenDX to offer FDA-approved Reverse Transcriptase PCR (rRT-PCR) assay for the specific detection of the SARS-CoV-2 virus. The assay validation exceeds the minimum recommendations put forth by the FDA guidance policies.

How do you administer the test?

You will receive a kit that includes easy-to use sputum collection device. Simply collect and ship it back at your convenience.

Is this test covered by insurance?

In many cases we are able to work with your insurance providers to reduce and often eliminate the costs of the testing.

How often should we test our employees?

Most our clients elect for seasonal testing, once every three months.

Assess risk factors for work-related exposure to COVID-19. Define protective measures employers should implement applicable to their industry. Understand workers rights to a safe and healthy workplace. Review strategies for protecting mental health during the crisis.
